Text: RE Can You Refer This Residential Gas Service CallJohn Please followup on this Thanks Original Message From Corman Shelley Sent Monday October PM To Long John Dowden Jr Jimmy Subject Can You Refer This Residential Gas Service Call We received a call this morning from a gentleman Todd Bearden who recently moved into a home in Hollywood FL and is trying to obtain information about gas service could one of you pass this request on the appropriate person at NUICity Gas or TECOPGS
